title: Soccer star Megan Rapinoe announces she'll retire at end of NWSL season
description: American soccer star Megan Rapinoe announced her plans to retire at the end of the current NWSL season on Saturday.

title: Six dead in small plane crash in southern California
description: Six people are dead after a Cessna business jet crashed in southern California early Saturday morning, officials say.

title: Zelenskyy hails Ukraine’s forces from symbolic Black Sea island to mark 500 days of war
description: Ukrainian president Volodymyr Zelenskyy posted a video of himself visiting Snake Island — the tiny Black Sea outpost that became a symbol of Ukrainian resistance — to mark the 500th day of the war with Russia.

title: Kidney stones are rising among children and teens, especially girls, research shows
description: Young people, especially girls, are being treated for kidney stones more often in recent years, emerging research shows. Doctors are unsure why.

title: A shipwreck awash in Black history takes center stage in Alabama
description: On July 8, 1860, a schooner carrying 110 men, women and children stolen from Africa sailed into waters near Mobile Bay under the cover of night.

title: Roger Stone joins Trump on his private plane to Las Vegas after a campaign stop in Iowa
description: Roger Stone, the political provocateur and strategist once pardoned by Donald Trump of multiple felony convictions, accompanied his longtime ally on the road on Friday.

title: Manson family killer will be paroled, lawyer says, after Gov. Newsom drops effort to block her freedom
description: Leslie Van Houten, a follower of Charles Manson who was convicted in two killings, will be paroled in weeks, her attorney said Friday after California’s governor said he would not challenge it at the State Supreme Court.
